alice.respect.core

Class RespectVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • alice.respect.core.RespectVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RespectVM
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    RespecT Tuple Centre Virtual Machine. Defines the core behaviour of a tuple centre virtual machine. The behaviour reflects the operational semantic expressed in related tuple centre articles.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    aricci
